@@ -778,0 +778,9 @@
+\f[V]System.native_heap_info\f[R] (Linux only)
+Prints information about native heap usage through malloc_info(3).
+.RS
+.PP
+Impact: Low
+.PP
+Permission: \f[V]java.lang.management.ManagementPermission(monitor)\f[R]
+.RE
+.TP
